title: Twitter testing new conversation thread button for Spaces
content:
Twitter continues to enhance its Spaces live audio platform with new features, and now the social network has announced another change that will bring even more ways to interact with other users. The company is testing a new conversation thread button that will be available for Spaces.

moreâ€¦

The post Twitter testing new conversation thread button for Spaces appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter continues to improve its live audio platform, and it is now testing a conversation thread button for Spaces.
